name: SKleefeld
text:
@roytang FYI, there's an unofficial RSS feed available for Crabgrass (and many other comics) at this link. I believe it's based off a scrape of the GoComics site, but that means it does include the Sunday strips.

Also Curtis = Miles. The strip from July 23, 2019 explains that Curtis is actually his middle name. Bondia explained that it basically just took him a while to settle on a name he actually liked for the character.
https://www.comicsrss.com/
